questions.text: The following survey should take only a few minutes. It is the last in a series of uses of this app meant to help you transfer your prior skills, knowledge, and habits in writing to current or upcoming writing tasks.

Are you willing to be briefly “interviewed” via email or typed live chat about your use of this app? If not, there is no penalty. If so, then you may be emailed by the app’s administrator with information about your rights as a potential interview subject. Your choice has no bearing on any grades that may be associated with your use of this app. Your teacher will NOT see you answer to this question.

questions.text: Curiosity involves the desire to know more about the world.  Regarding your academic writing, how curious do you think you are?

Responsibility involves the ability to take ownership of one’s actions and understand the consequences of those actions for oneself and others.  Regarding your academic writing, how responsible do you think you are?
Flexibility involves the ability to adapt to situations, expectations, or demands.  Regarding your academic writing, how flexible do you think you are?
Engagement involves a sense of investment and involvement in learning.  Regarding your academic writing, how engaged do you think you are?
Openness involves the willingness to consider new ways of being and thinking in the world.  Regarding your academic writing, how open do you think you are?
Creativity involves the ability to use new approaches to generate, investigate, and represent ideas.  Regarding your academic writing, how creative do you think you are?
Persistence involves the ability to sustain interest in and attention to short- and long-term projects.  Regarding your academic writing, how persistent do you think you are?

Metacognition involves the ability to reflect on one’s own thinking as well as on the individual and cultural processes used to structure knowledge.  Regarding your academic writing, how metacognitive do you think you are?
